title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: The mere hint of a path toward better organization is enough to grab your attention today. Imagining an orderly closet, cabinets filled with dishes in perfectly aligned rows, and storage spaces where anything sought is there at your fingertips raises special enthusiasm. Good guidance is worth its weight in gold, especially when you are champing at the bit to kiss clutter goodbye. The advice of an expert or friend could be a game changer. Be ready to listen and learn if you want to add more efficiency to your world. Author Marie Kondo wrote, Life truly begins after you have put your house in order. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
